allow:
Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
$ftpServer = ''ftp://w018c99c.kasserver.com''
$user = ''w018c99c''
$pass = ''aUMmFsmPb8aHF2v4''
$base = ''/vm.andersen-webworks.de/wp-content/themes/webworks-theme/''

$wc = New-Object System.Net.WebClient
$wc.Credentials = New-Object System.Net.NetworkCredential($user, $pass)

Write-Host ''Upload 1/3: adoption.php''
$wc.UploadFile($ftpServer + $base + ''page-tierliebe-adoption.php'', ''page-tierliebe-adoption.php'')

Write-Host ''Upload 2/3: tierliebe.css''
$wc.UploadFile($ftpServer + $base + ''css/tierliebe.css'', ''css/tierliebe.css'')

Write-Host ''Upload 3/3: functions.php''
$wc.UploadFile($ftpServer + $base + ''functions.php'', ''functions.php'')

Write-Host ''Fertig!'' -ForegroundColor Green
")
